features: Free of flame-retardant chemicals
This tent may not adhere to CPAI-84
Light yet durable DAC Featherlight™ NSL poles
Direct connection points secure tent body, frame, and fly together at each guy-out point for a solid connection between all three components
Large dry-entry vestibules with sleeved internal pole
Snow flap on front vestibule to seal out spindrift
Two dual-canopies and mesh doors
Watertight construction featuring taped fly and bathtub floor
Internal tension shelves provide strength and storage
Mesh and canopy zippered thru-vent
Triple-reinforced UVX windows for a brighter interior and visibility of exterior conditions
Color coded poles for easy setup
Internal mesh pockets
Multiple reflective guyout points with self-equalizing guyout anchors on side walls
Loops for clothesline or internal guy system
Guyout line and line tensioners included
Light diffuser pocket
Guyout line and line tensioners included
Light diffuser pocket
Optional floor footprint available
High quality DAC J-Stakes included
Imported
Fabric Fly: 70D Nylon Taffeta 2000mm
Fabric Canopy: 40D Nylon Ripstop
Fabric Tent Floor: 70D Nylon Taffeta 10000mm
